Provided by: nvram-wakeup_1.1-5_amd64 

NAME
       biosinfo - Shows type, revision and vendor of the mainboard as well as vendor version and release date of
       the BIOS.


SYNOPSIS
       biosinfo [--debug]


DESCRIPTION
       biosinfo  is  a  (small) program, that shows you some information about the installed mainboard and BIOS.
       This may help you troubleshooting problems with nvram-wakeup. For support requests,  please  include  the
       output of this program.


OPTIONS
       --debug
              This option enables printing debug messages.


SEE ALSO
       nvram-wakeup(8)


HOMEPAGE
       http://sf.net/projects/nvram-wakeup/


AUTHOR
       Written by Sergei Haller <Sergei.Haller@math.uni-giessen.de>.
